description: Create and manage a Domain Configuration

AllowAuthorizerOverride.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

DefaultAuthorizerName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[\w=,@-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AuthorizerConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-cn|-us-gov|-iso-b|-iso)?:acm:[a-z]{2}-(gov-|iso-|isob-)?[a-z]{4,9}-\d{1}:\d{12}:certificate/[a-zA-Z0-9/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: INVALID | VALID  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateStatusDetail.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateSummary.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityPolicy.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

TlsConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainConfigurationName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[\w.-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 253  
Update requires: Replacement

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-cn|-us-gov|-iso-b|-iso)?:acm:[a-z]{2}-(gov-|iso-|isob-)?[a-z]{4,9}-\d{1}:\d{12}:certificate/[a-zA-Z0-9/-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateArns.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

ServiceType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DATA | CREDENTIAL_PROVIDER | JOBS  
Update requires: Replacement

ValidationCertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(-cn|-us-gov|-iso-b|-iso)?:acm:[a-z]{2}-(gov-|iso-|isob-)?[a-z]{4,9}-\d{1}:\d{12}:certificate/[a-zA-Z0-9/-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

DomainConfigurationStatus.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DomainType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENDPOINT | AWS_MANAGED | CUSTOMER_MANAGED  
Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificates.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption
